titleStmt.title: An exact account of the success of his majesties army in Ireland for the last week; giving a relation of the number killed. Together with a list of the officers names taken prisoners and brought into Dublin. With a description of the train of artillery that is gone to besidge Athlon.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print show-through, tightly bound with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
